input.sentences: my wife had a few choice words for me as she saw our daughter dressed up in the kitchen .
it 's good that she did n't care to much because it would have been a shame .

output.sentences: My wife was saying words in the kitchen, but I wasn't listening.
My daughter then gave me shame for not listening but told me to care more.
